revisions.rev:
'''Police brutality''' is a term used todescribe the excessive use of force by [[police]] officers. Police brutality can become a major issue especially when the police are from a different social group as the people they police. In such a situation, the general population may view the police as oppressors, while the police may begin to view the population as criminals.
This has been the case with [[African-American]]s in the United States, and [[Catholics]] in [[Northern Ireland]].
See also: [[Amadou Diallo]], [[Ramparts]], [[Rodney King]]
